name: Takashi
more-info: Senior Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience in full-stack development and AI/ML engineering. Based in Tokyo, I specialize in building high-quality web applications, AI-powered solutions, and scalable backend systems for startups and enterprise clients.
about-text-top: Highly motivated Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience in front-end development and 5 years in back-end development. I have a proven track record in building high-quality web and mobile applications from scratch, particularly within startups and freelance environments. My expertise lies in delivering clean, useful, and 100% customer-focused products.
about-text-bottom: Recently, I've expanded into AI/ML engineering, building backend ML/analytics pipelines for time-series anomaly detection at Seeq Corporation, and currently leading AI solutions including multilingual NLP/RAG pipelines at SBWorks. I'm equally comfortable working in Japanese and English environments, collaborating with cross-cultural teams across the globe.

projects.description: B2B Sales Intelligence SaaS platform with AI-powered lead generation, intelligent scoring, and interactive analytics dashboards. Features GPT-4 powered sales assistant, automated outreach generation, and real-time pipeline visualization.

Full-stack ChatGPT clone built with the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) using OpenAI GPT-3.5 Turbo API. Features authentication, Google OAuth, real-time AI chat, auto-save to MongoDB, chat history, dark/light mode, and PWA support.

AI-powered clinical decision support system using RAG architecture to query medical literature, drug interactions, and treatment guidelines. Supports Japanese and English medical terminology with citation-backed answers.

AI Agent Builder empowers users to create sophisticated AI-powered automation workflows through an intuitive visual interface. Built with modern full-stack architecture, it demonstrates enterprise-level patterns for real-time collaboration, serverless computing, and intelligent agent orchestration.
Open-source AI chat application built with TypeScript and Next.js, it uses Supabase for backend storage. Version 2.0 supports various AI models with Docker and Vercel deployment options.

Conversational AI chatbot built with Flask and ChatterBot. Uses natural language processing with NLTK to understand and respond to user messages. Features real-time chat interface and trained on English conversation corpus.
Designed scalable document processing system handling >500K documents/month. Features multilingual OCR, NLP extraction, and intelligent classification.
End-to-end RAG system with vector databases, semantic search, and LLM integration. Supports enterprise knowledge management with high retrieval accuracy.
Voice AI system with real-time speech recognition, natural language understanding, and text-to-speech. Supports Japanese and English with low latency.
Automated business workflows using n8n, integrating AI services, databases, and external APIs. Reduced manual processes by 80% for enterprise clients.
Cloud-native MLOps pipeline with Docker, Kubernetes, and CI/CD automation. Features model versioning, A/B testing, and automated retraining triggers.
Real-time event streaming platform using Kafka and Spark. Processes high-volume data for industrial analytics with sub-second latency.
E-commerce predictive analytics system for demand forecasting and customer behavior analysis. Improved inventory efficiency by 35%.
